Body:
I have issue to deploy UWP app on Windows IoT (on raspberri pi2 device) :

Error DEP4300 : Could not generate the root folder for app package xxx|VS.Debug_x86.xxx|CN=xx|xxxxxx.Debug_x86.xxx with base layout folder of C:\Users\xxxx. Illegal characters in path.

Windows 10 IoT version: 10.0.10586 VS 2015 SP3

Thanks
You can re-flash SD card with newer Windows iot core using [IoT Dashboard](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot/docs/iotdashboard).
Okay. Thanks for help. I will test that you suggest as soon as possible and I will post a feedback here.
Hi @RitaHan-MSFT, it works for me. But it is a strange way to make updates...
Yes, but how to update the remote debugger on Windows 10 IoT? I tried to click on the Check for updates" button in "Windows update" page of the device portal but it seems this does not work."

So, I found the solution, in the comment of Rita Han, which is to flash the sd card with the newer Windows IoT core. See the following link:

IoT Dashboard

"
